name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior JavaScript Engineer with over 9 years of experience specializing in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and building scalable software solutions. Proficient in developing APIs using both **REST** and **SOAP**, and skilled in database management with **SQL**, **SQLite**, and **PostgreSQL**. Experienced in Cloud technologies with **AWS Lambda** and **API Gateway**, leveraging the **Serverless Framework** to enhance application performance and scalability. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and mentor junior engineers while executing impactful projects focused on user experience and innovation. Dedicated to improving accessibility and driving technical excellence, including the implementation of **Automated Testing** practices.
